description:
The plugin creates a resizable, movable, rectangular crop area to select and crop an area of an image you specify.
You can set the desired aspect radio in order to get the images that will suit perfectly in your layouts.
name: Resize and crop uploader
plugin_instructions:
1. Add the Resize and crop uploader element to the page.
2. Set the aspect ratio you need from the element properties.
3. Handle in the workflow the cropped image.
You can use the Action "Resize And Crop Cropping finishes".
Or you can get the attribute "uploaded image" from the element to save the cropped image.
